metadata.description: Omega Chase is the story of Mack Baron, a man who knows who he is but doesn't know where he's supposed to be. Currently, he's the sheriff of a 19th century Texas town... but he also vaguely recalls being an officer on a 24th century starship... and an archer in a band of medieval adventurers. He'd love to sort it all out, but a zombie horde has just entered town, and he is Sheriff after all...
metadata.name: Omega Chase
